data.message: hi there! i have a problem, that on one of my pages i can't edit the link title, desciption and image. I paste the url into the textfield, but when i click on the default link title or description, i can't change them. Is it a bug or a setting issue? can you help me how to fix? we spent 5000 usd for ads in the last 2 weeks...

replies.message: Hi Gergely. Have you tried following these steps to edit the basic information on your Page? Learn more: http://bit.ly/2oEAFx0. If you're still unable to make any changes, please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2nFNYMK. Thanks. -Jessica
